description_for_human: Real-time shopping search and product price lookup. Paid via ACP and x402.
description_for_model: A paid tool for real-time shopping search. Use the Agentic Commerce Protocol (ACP) endpoints to create a checkout session and the x402 protocol for payment. The primary product ID is 'api-search-v1'.

tools.description: Standard agentic commerce protocol for managing transactions. Use this to get the price and initiate a purchase.

endpoints.purpose: Creates a checkout session to determine the price and get a session ID for a product or service. The primary item ID is 'api-search-v1'.
Completes a checkout session using a proof-of-payment token (e.g., from x402).

tools.description: The paid resource. Executes a product search after a successful payment has been made via the commerce_protocol.

endpoints.purpose: Executes the paid search. Requires a valid L402 authorization token obtained through the ACP checkout flow.

auth.notes: Payment is handled using x402 on EVM & Solana networks. Use the 'commerce_protocol' tool to get the final price and session details before initiating payment.
